text: Š Nuoraid Magaziidna (Š Youth Magazine), typically referred to simply as Š, is a Sámi bimonthly magazine focused on music, movies, sports, and youth culture. Founded in 1993, it is published by Iđut AS in , Norway, and, as of 2020, its editor is Niels Ovllá Oskal Dunfjell. Š is primarily written in Northern Sámi, but it also includes articles in Southern Sámi, Lule Sámi, and Norwegian. It is distributed for free to eighth-grade students across Norway, as well as to students studying Sámi languages. The magazine is active on both Facebook and Instagram. == References == ==External links== * Š website * Š on Instagram * Š on Facebook Category:1993 establishments in Norway Category:Publications established in 1993 Category:Sami in Norway Category:Sami magazines Category:Northern Sami-language magazines
title: Š (magazine)
